languages.text: {n}Варп непредсказуем и опасен — можно только посочувствовать астропатам, чей долг обязывает погружаться разумом в глубины Имматериума.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Варп непредсказуем и опасен — можно только посочувствовать астропатам, чей долг обязывает погружаться в глубины Имматериума.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Варп непредсказуем и опасен — можно только посочувствовать астропатам, чей долг обязывает погружаться разумом в глубины Имматериума.{/n}

{n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}
{n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}
{n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La disformidad es impredecible y peligrosa; otro motivo para compadecerse de los astrópatas, cuyo deber les obliga a penetrar con sus mentes en las profundidades del inmaterio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La disformidad es impredecible y peligrosa; otro motivo para compadecerse de los astrópatas, cuyo deber les obliga a penetrar con sus mentes en las profundidades del inmaterio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}<歪み>は予測不可能で危険だ。非物質世界の深淵に心を突っ込まざるを得ない感応通信官に同情するしかない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}<歪み>は予測不可能で危険だ。非物質世界の深淵に心を突っ込まざるを得ない感応通信官に同情するしかない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}亚空间难以预测，充满危机。对于那些为了履行职责，不得不将思想浸入亚空间深处的星语者，你只能对他们报以同情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}亚空间难以预测，充满危机。对于那些为了履行职责，不得不将思想浸入亚空间深处的星语者，你只能对他们报以同情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Warp ist unberechenbar und gefährlich ... man muss mit den Astropathen fast Mitleid haben, deren Pflicht es ist, mit ihrem Verstand in die Tiefen des Immateriums einzutauchen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Warp ist unberechenbar und gefährlich ... man muss mit den Astropathen fast Mitleid haben, deren Pflicht es ist, mit ihrem Verstand in die Tiefen des Immateriums einzutauchen.

languages.text: {n}Le Warp est aussi imprévisible que périlleux. Nul ne peut nier le courage des astropathes, dont le devoir les condamne à s'aventurer au plus profond de l'Immaterium.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Warp est aussi imprévisible que périlleux. Nul ne peut nier le courage des astropathes, dont le devoir les condamne à s'aventurer au plus profond de l'Immaterium.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Öteboyut, öngörülemez ve tehlikeli bir yerdir. İnsanın elinden yalnızca vazifeleri gereği zihinlerini Tindiyar'ın derinliklerine daldıran Astropatların acılarını anlamak gelir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warp is unpredictable and perilous — one can only sympathise with Astropaths whose duty compels them to plunge their minds into the depths of the Immaterium.{/n}
